inclusion.criterion: able to provide informed consent for their data to be included in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pre-existing urinary tract pathologies (neuropathic bladder, urologic pathologies or surgery)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients unable to provide informed consent for themselves
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of BPH and multiple urological procedures, including suprapubic prostatectomy. He currently has a urinary catheter in place due to severe urethral stricture.
